name: Default Theme
css: body { margin: 0; background: linear-gradient(135deg, #1f1c2c, #928DAB); font-family: 'Segoe UI', sans-serif; color: #fff; display: flex; flex-direction: column; align-items: center; min-height: 100vh; overflow-x: hidden; } .img-box { background: #000; border: 4px solid white; border-radius: 12px; overflow: hidden; position: relative; box-shadow: 0 8px 24px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5); aspect-ratio: 1.91 / 1; }

name: Dark Sky
css: body { background: linear-gradient(135deg, #141e30, #243b55); color: #eee; } .img-box { border: 4px solid #ffffff; }

name: Light Pink
css: body { background: linear-gradient(to right, #ffecd2, #fcb69f); color: #333; } .img-box { border: 4px solid #ffbbbb; }
